item.title: 'I think of my body as a teacher,' says Marine who struggled with disordered eating
item.description: During her years as a military linguist, Bailey Williams pushed her body to extremes. Her new book is Hollow: A Memoir of My Body in the Marines.

item.title: Macy's says an employee hid as much as $154 million in expenses
item.description: The employee "intentionally made erroneous accounting accrual entries" to hide millions of dollars, Macy's said. The error forced the company to delay...

item.title: Ocean explorers hoped they photographed Amelia Earhart's plane. Turns out it's a rock
